string.text: Patch (Clear Sky)
An insignia torn from a Clear Sky uniform.
Patch (Clear Sky)

An insignia torn from a Clear Sky uniform.
This patch depicts a sunrise against a clear blue sky, flanked by doves. The design is meant to communicate the faction's desire to heal the Zone, as well as its distaste for conflict.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Faction Patch
Patch (Freedom)
An insignia torn from Freedom uniform.
Patch (Freedom)

An insignia torn from Freedom uniform.
This patch depicts a green wolf set against a black background alongside the Ukrainian flag. The design is meant to communicate Freedom's social nature and love of the land alongside their staunch determination and collective predatory viciousness in battle.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Faction Patch
Patch (Loner)
An insignia torn from a Loner uniform.
Patch (Loner)

An insignia torn from a Loner uniform.\Depicting a simple trefoil, this patch is commonly worn by stalkers not aligned with any specific faction.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Faction Patch
Patch (Ecologist)
An insignia torn from an Ecologist uniform.
Patch (Ecologist)

An insignia torn from an Ecologist uniform.
This patch depicts a pair of golden wings set against a white and cyan background.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Faction Patch
Patch (Bandit)
An insignia torn from a Bandit uniform.
Patch (Bandit)

An insignia torn from a Bandit uniform.
This patch depicts a cracked black skull set against a white shield. The design is meant to communicate the ruthless retribution they bring upon anyone who dares defy them.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Faction Patch
Patch (Duty)
An insignia torn from a Duty uniform.
Patch (Duty)

An insignia torn from a Duty uniform.
This patch depicts a gold crosshair set against a red and black shield. The design is meant to allude to the faction's military roots, without detracting from their chief role as the stoic protectors of the Zone from the outside world.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Faction Patch
Patch (Monolith)
An insignia torn from a Monolith uniform.
Patch (Monolith)

An insignia torn from a Monolith uniform.
This patch depicts feathered wings set against a golden sun. Monolith patches are prized among other groups, as they demonstrate the ability to fight against them and live.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Faction Patch
Patch (Military)
An insignia torn from a Ukrainian army uniform.
Patch (Military)

An insignia torn from a Ukrainian army uniform.
This patch depicts a full military coat of arms with three heater shields, the centermost of which features the colors of the Ukrainian flag. The military fancy themselves as protectors and peacekeepers, first and foremost.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Faction Patch
Patch (Mercenary)
An insignia torn from a Mercenary uniform.
Patch (Mercenary)

An insignia torn from a Mercenary uniform.
This patch depicts an azure bird of prey set against a black background. The design is meant to be indicative of the Mercenary's character as a faction of cold, precise, highly mobile soldiers of fortune.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Faction Patch
Patch (UNISG)

An insignia torn from a UNISG uniform.
This patch depicts a white microscope girded by highly angular, stylized laurels set against a maroon background. Sewn onto the back is a label that reads: 'United Nations International Scientific Group'.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Faction Patch
Patch (Sin)

An insignia torn from a uniform belonging to Sin.
This patch depicts a serpent in the top-left corner with an Eastern Orthodox Cross in the top-right. Against the center of the badge sits a stylized image of an eclipse.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Faction Patch
Patch (Renegades)

An insignia torn from a Renegades uniform.
This patch depicts a yellow scorpion set against a lush green shield. Its existence implies some form of organization within the faction, though no one today would believe they would band together out of anything but sheer desperation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Faction Patch
